message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I think it's a great deal and will be really useful for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're looking for a good price, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. $120 is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
